price: 65 Que leurs paroles ne t’affligent pas. Il n’est de puissance qu’en Allah qui entend tout et sait tout.
arabic: وَلَا يَحۡزُنكَ قَوۡلُهُمۡۘ إِنَّ ٱلۡعِزَّةَ لِلَّهِ جَمِيعًاۚ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: walā yaḥzunka qawluhum inna al-ʿizata lillahi jamīʿan huwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
